title: Dead Man Walking
description: It was just another routine execution... until the condemned killer came back as an undead, unstoppable, killing machine.Now, a handful of correctional officers and inmates are trapped within the walls of the prison as a legion of the walking dead stalks them for food.The ammo is limited, the zombie army is growing, and one correctional officer is pushed to his limits as he realizes that death is no longer the end.Dead Man Walking, a novelette with approximately 10,970 words, is the first story in the exciting Voodoo Zombie trilogy.
author: Marty Shaw
